name: By The Sea (Web Version)
description:
You return by train to your sleepy coastal town, only to find it upturned by an arrogant, ambitious property developer and his plan for a new luxury hotel right on the seafront.

Talk your way through the town's eccentric inhabitants, to try and find a resolution to the crisis and bring the whole community together (or at least most of it, you're not a miracleworker).
